ovdesc.p: This application is used to record the Buyer-Seller limit for information purpose.This application will hold Buyer's maximum exposure for which the record is setup
The ID of the application could be the Buyer's customer reference suffixed with 'BS'
The Buyer-Seller limit will be update when any BL.REGISTER which has the BL.TYPE attached has its INFO.PARTY defined as 'BUYER-SELLER'
